meanings.definition: Metals made by combining two different metals.
meanings.sent1: The factory produced bimetals for use in construction projects.
meanings.sent2: She studied the properties of bimetals in her science class.
meanings.sent3: The bimetals in the lab seemed to have a mind of their own, clinking together playfully.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was like bimetals, a strong bond formed from two different personalities.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering bimetals caught the sunlight, creating a dazzling display.

meanings.definition: A material made by fusing two metals together.
meanings.sent1: The artist crafted a beautiful sculpture using bimetals.
meanings.sent2: The engineer tested the durability of the bimetals in extreme conditions.
meanings.sent3: The bimetals in the workshop danced together, creating a harmonious blend of colors.
meanings.sent4: Their partnership was like bimetals, a seamless fusion of talents.
meanings.sent5: The bimetals glowed with a unique radiance, attracting attention from all around.
